subject: HANDS OFF MY GORGONZOLA
message: If I've told you once, I've told you 1000 times... DON'T BE TOUCHING MY CHEESE MAN! This is medical grade gorgonzola, not just your crappy cheddar, so please don't use it for your ham and cheese toasties!

subject: Recreation request
message: Add ping pong balls and bins to upcoming supply request.

subject: LAUNCH CODES: Weak Change
message: Why oh why did you change the launch codes to that? You can't just have them as your date of birth backwards. I've added today's date to your dob, and then reversed it... slightly better if you ask me... which you never do :(

subject: Hello
message: I think the stress is getting to me. I am actually writing to myself.

subject: Assistance Needed
message: 3 across: Orange and sounds like a parrot? Any ideas?
